front.title: Ethernet in the First Mile Copper (EFMCu) Interfaces MIB

abstract.t: This document defines a portion of the Management Information Base (MIB) for use with network management protocols in TCP/IP based Internets. This document proposes an extension to the Ethernet-like Interfaces MIB and MAU MIB with a set of objects for managing an Ethernet in the First Mile Copper (EFMCu) interfaces 10PassTS and 2BaseTL defined in IEEE 802.3ah.
